name: Fun time happy party ESL whiteboard games for EFL teaching and learning English
name_original: Fun time happy party ESL whiteboard games for EFL teaching and learning English
description:
Be a superstar in your English class with over 20 fun educational games and activities!

including:

*Hangman

*Endless Runner

*Board Game

*Memory

*Matching

And more!

Kid tested teacher approved! 

Our development team includes teachers with decades of experience.

All the games you need for a fun and engaging ESL class!

Play old favorites and new exciting games like "Monkey Chase"

We've got a large set of vocabulary available and the option to add your own!

Note: for teaching convenience and portability to different computers the game is provided as a standalone executable which does not need to be installed.
